ModMetaData.name: Transmog (Fork)
ModMetaData.author: Local Ghost, b0unt9
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Transmog (1.6 Update)[/h1] This is a [b]update[/b] of the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3222605360]original "Transmog" mod[/url] for RimWorld, updated to support [b]version 1.6[/b]. [hr][/hr]
[h2]ðŸ“œ Credits[/h2] [list] [*] Original mod by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198325952994/]zeus[/url][/b] ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3222605360]Workshop page[/url]) [*] 1.6 update by [b][url=https://github.com/b0unt9]Bounty[/url][/b] [/list] [hr][/hr]
[h2]ðŸ”§ Compatibility[/h2] [list] [*] Incompatible with the original mod (disable one or the other) [/list] [hr][/hr]
